meanings.definition: A thick cut of beef tenderloin.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served delicious chateaubriands for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a chateaubriands steak at the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The chateaubriands on my plate looked like a juicy mountain of meat.
meanings.sent4: The chateaubriands on the grill sizzled like a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the chateaubriands cooking made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A dish made with a thick cut of beef tenderloin.
meanings.sent1: My mom's special recipe includes chateaubriands as the main course.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared a mouthwatering chateaubriands dish for the event.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone raved about the chateaubriands my friend cooked.
meanings.sent4: The chateaubriands dish was a masterpiece of flavors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The chateaubriands dish was the highlight of the dinner party.

meanings.definition: The name of a French diplomat and writer.
meanings.sent1: Chateaubriands was a famous figure in French history.
meanings.sent2: I read an interesting biography about Chateaubriands last week.
meanings.sent3: In the library, I stumbled upon a book about Chateaubriands' life.
meanings.sent4: Chateaubriands' literary works are still studied today.
meanings.sent5: The name Chateaubriands always reminds me of classic French literature.
